alert.note: Alert for Sedgwick (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 09 at 10:54PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Sedgwick and southwestern Butler Counties through 1145 PM CDT... At 1053 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near East Wichita, or near Andover, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wichita, Derby, El Dorado, Andover, Haysville, Augusta, Park City, Bel Aire, Mulvane, Rose Hill, Douglass, Towanda, Benton, Downtown Wichita, Kechi, Eastborough, Northeast Wichita, East Wichita, Mcconnell Air Force Base and South Wichita. This includes the following highways... Interstate 135 between Mile Markers 0 and 14. Interstate 35 between Mile Markers 34 and 77. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
